description: The SF-3A Lancer II is a general-purpose space fighter designed for service aboard the space carrier ships of the U.N. Spacy. Armed with two large cannons and long-range missile launchers, the Lancer II is well suited to battling at long distances typical in space. There were 78 manned Lancer II fighters stationed aboard the ARMD-01 Space Carrier when Space War I began in February 2009 and they were the first combat craft to participate in the war.
name: SF-3A Lancer II
